insert into t_im_redisinfo (createTime, recordTime, serviceName, serviceIp, usedMemory, usedMemoryRss, usedMemoryPeak, totalSystemMemory, usedMemoryLua, memFragmentationRatio) values (#{createTime}, #{recordTime}, #{serviceName}, #{serviceip}, #{used_memory}, #{used_memory_rss}, #{used_memory_peak}, #{total_system_memory}, #{used_memory_lua}, #{mem_fragmentation_ratio})
